extendedInfo.description: If you are Arctic Monkeys's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Arctic Monkeys's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Arctic Monkeys's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Arctic Monkeys's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)************************Main Features ************************- Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics************************List of albums ************************- Whatever People Say I Am, That's What I'm Not- Favourite Worst Nightmare- Humbug- Suck It and See************************List of lyrics ************************- 505- A Certain Romance- All My Own Stunts- Balaclava- Black Treacle- Brianstorm- Brick By Brick- Cornerstone- Crying Lightning- D Is For Dangerous- Da Frame 2R- Dance Little Liar- Dancing Shoes- Dangerous Animals- Do Me A Favour- Don't Sit Down 'Cause I've Moved Your Chair- Fake Tales Of San Francisco- Fire And The Thud- Fluorescent Adolescent- From The Ritz To The Rubble- I Bet You Look Good On The Dancefloor- If You Were There, Beware- Library Pictures- Love Is A Laserquest- Mardy Bum- Matador- My Propeller- Old Yellow Bricks- Only Ones Who Know- Perhaps Vampires Is A Bit Strong But...- Piledriver Waltz- Potion Approaching- Pretty Visitors- Reckless Serenade- Red Light Indicates Doors Are Secured- Riot Van- Secret Door- She's Thunderstorms- Still Take You Home- Suck It And See- Teddy Picker- That's Where You're Wrong- The Bad Thing- The Hellcat Spangled Shalalala- The Jeweller's Hands- The View From The Afternoon- This House Is A Circus- When The Sun Goes Down- You Probably Couldn't See For The Lights But You Were Staring Straight At Me

reviews.title: Arctic monkeys lyrics
reviews.comment: This app is good if you only line older Arctic monkeys music. It needs to be updated with some new lyrics desperately. Not worth the download. Also crammed with ads. Its Terrible quality and its very slow. Don\'t even bother using it.
reviews.author: Isabelle Joubert
